page.title: 15HOW WE LIVE
page.content:
My name is Claire Tatterton. I live at 6 Austerbank Avenue with my mum,dad and sister.We haven't any pets. I live in a semi detached house.It has 3 bedrooms , kitchen , bathroom and a lounge.We have 3 televisions.We have 3 bikes,2 radios and 1 record player.We have electric lighting and gas heating.We use an electric cooker.
My name is Kirsty Leanne Poskitt. I live at 14 Austerbank Avenue with my mum,dad and 2 sisters.We have 2 cats and 1 goldfish. I live in a semi detached house it has 3 bedrooms,1 dining room,kitchen, lounge and 1 bathroom.We have 2 cars 2 telephones,3 televisions,1 video,2 cassettes and 1 radio.We have a coal fire we have electric lights.We use an electric cooker and a microwave oven.
